name: TAPE ZERO
storyline:
You play as a man who wakes up in a hospital, with no memory on who he is, or how he got there.
Find out his identity, discover his story.

"My name is Brandon, I'm a detective.
No, I'm a _________. I need to talk to someone.
I want to tell someone my story. I want to tell you, my story.
I've been finding these tapes, tapes about me.
Someone has been following me, filming me.
My wife is in danger, my _i__ is in danger.
I don't know if those tapes are real, I don't know if anything is real, I don't even know where I am.
__l_ me.
Please ..., __l_ me."
summary:
This is TAPE ZERO, an action-horror game. You play as a man who wakes up in a hospital, with no memory on who he is, or how he got there.
Find out his identity, discover his story.

"My name is Brandon, I'm a detective.
No, I'm a _________. I need to talk to someone.
I want to tell someone my story, I want to tell you, my story.
I've been finding these tapes, tapes about me.
Someone has been following me, filming me.
My wife is in danger, my _i__ is in danger.
I don't know if those tapes are real, I don't know if anything is real, I don't even know where I am.
__l_ me.
Please ..., __l_ me."


Key features:

    Find all the clues to complete the story.
    Explore a wide variety of maps and locations.
    Use your lighter and weapons effectively to fight and escape the monsters.
    Use light to your advantage to damage enemies.
    Discover secrets and hidden clues.
    Use the scarce ammunition and battery packs Intelligently.
    A 6/7 hours long game.
